Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides with potential for biofilm eradication: synthesis and structure activity relationship studies of battacin peptides
Literature.Author: De Zoysa GH, Cameron AJ, Hegde VV, Raghothama S, Sarojini V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5-10µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5-10µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=5-10µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae(MIC=2.5-5µM)
